DataElement.preferredName: Lesion Alteration Cerebral Cortex Involvement Absent Present Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication of the absence or presence of non-enhancing or enhancing tumor that extends to the cortical mantle, or if the cortex is no longer distinguishable relative to subjacent tumor.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: (LEE-zhun) An area of abnormal tissue change._A change resulting in something that is different from the original._MRI method that measure the diffusion of water in the tissue, rather than the content of water as measured in conventional MRI._The outer layer of the cerebrum composed of neurons and unmyelinated nerve fibers.  It is responsible for memory, attention, consciousness and other high mental functions._To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (LEE-zhun) An area of abnormal tissue change.:A change resulting in something that is different from the original.

Concepts.definition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.
The act or process of modifying something.

Property.preferredDefinition: The outer layer of the cerebrum composed of neurons and unmyelinated nerve fibers.  It is responsible for memory, attention, consciousness and other high mental functions.:To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

Concepts.definition: The outer layer of the cerebrum composed of neurons and unmyelinated nerve fibers. It is responsible for memory, attention, consciousness and other higher levels of mental function.
To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 1/29/13 released.  1/24/13 jc CDE to support new feature in 2011 VASARI Features Key list.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of being absent or present.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not existing in a specified place at a specified time.

Concepts.definition: Not existing in a specified place at a specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not existing in a specified place at a specified time.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: Not existing in a specified place at a specified time.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
